title: XDM Business Person Details
description: This mixin is used to capture B2B Person specific attributes. A B2B Person could be a contact/lead etc.

xdm:personStatus.title: Person Status
xdm:personStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the Person.

xdm:accountID.title: Contact Account id
xdm:accountID.description: ID of the account that’s the parent of this person.

xdm:personEmail.title: Person Email
xdm:personEmail.description: Email ID of the B2B person.

xdm:isConverted.title: Converted Indicator
xdm:isConverted.description: Indicates whether the Lead was successfully converted or not.

xdm:convertedDate.title: Converted Date
xdm:convertedDate.description: Date of conversion if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedAccountID.title: Converted Account ID
xdm:convertedAccountID.description: Account Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedContactID.title: Converted Contact ID
xdm:convertedContactID.description: Contact Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedOpportunityID.title: Converted Opportunity ID
xdm:convertedOpportunityID.description: Opportunity Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:leadSource.title: Lead Source
xdm:leadSource.description: Field recording what source the lead originated from.

xdm:isEmailBounced.title: Email Bounced Indicator
xdm:isEmailBounced.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, indicates whether the email bounced (true) or not (false).

xdm:emailBouncedDate.title: Email Bounced Date
xdm:emailBouncedDate.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, provides the date when the email was bounced.

xdm:emailBouncedReason.title: Email Bounced Reason
xdm:emailBouncedReason.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, provides the reason for bounced email.

xdm:inferredAddress.title: Inferred Address
xdm:inferredAddress.description: Address details inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredCompany.title: Inferred Company
xdm:inferredCompany.description: Company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredCompanyStatus.title: Inferred Company Status
xdm:inferredCompanyStatus.description: Status of the company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredMetropolitanArea.title: Inferred Metropolitan Area
xdm:inferredMetropolitanArea.description: Metropolitan area inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredPhoneAreaCode.title: Inferred Phone Area Code
xdm:inferredPhoneAreaCode.description: Phone area code inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:personOptInOut.title: Person Preferences
xdm:personOptInOut.description: Holds opt out values for different channels as selected by the person.
